&reftitle.parameters;
key
The key of the item to decrement.
offset
The amount by which to decrement the item's value; defaults to 1.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns item's new value on success&return.falseforfailure;. The Memcached::getResultCode will return Memcached::RES_NOTFOUND if the key does not exist.
